sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import {Tag} from "antd"; function PropertiesItemCard({data}) { const {image, title, subTitle, name, date, isFeatured, prize, sqft, bedrooms, baths, area, more} = data; return (
{isFeatured === true ? featured : null}
Featured
FOR SALE

{title}

{subTitle}

Bedrooms: {bedrooms}

Baths: {baths}

Area: {area}

+ {more} more

{name}

{date}

{prize}

{sqft}

Check in detail

); } export default PropertiesItemCard;
